menus.name: menus

type.name: other
type.value: ({ name: string; } & Partial<Menu>) | ({ link: string; } & Partial<Menu>) | undefined

type.summary: ({ name: string; } & Partial<Menu>) | ({ link: string; } & Partial<Menu>) | undefined

onClick.name: onClick
onClick.description: Callback to be called on Menu click**(only if it's not disabled)**

rounded.name: rounded
rounded.description: Makes active menu rounded **(applicable only for type: `vertical` and `expanded` menu)**

expanded.name: expanded
expanded.description: Set expanded state of `Navigation`**(applicable only for type: `vertical`)**

autoCollapse.name: autoCollapse
autoCollapse.description: Only one SubMenu visible at a time**(applicable only for type: `vertical`)**

customItemRenderer.name: customItemRenderer
customItemRenderer.description: Option to pass Custom Item Renderer

showTooltip.name: showTooltip
showTooltip.description: Determines whether to show tooltip for menu label

data-test.name: data-test
data-test.description: Stores custom testing data private to the component.
